## Restock Recommendation:

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                              |
| Rationale                         | Ordering 30,000 units ensures sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand for the next 5 days, including a margin of error for potential demand fluctuations. This order size also utilizes the maximum vendor order quantity, allowing for potential future discounts or increased inventory flexibility. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The player is currently planning to order 0 units, which is not enough to cover the forecasted demand.  Ordering 30,000 units instead will ensure adequate stock levels.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 1.8 days (Current Stock / Forecasted Demand) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6.1 days (Current Stock + Recommended Order Size / Forecasted Demand) |
| Comments                          |  Utilizing multiple vendor order quantities allows for flexible stock management. This order size also minimizes the potential for stockouts while maintaining a healthy inventory turnover rate.   |
